actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
	i.inventory_id,
  i.code,
  i.size,
  i.metal_weight,
  i.diamond_weight,
  s.image,
  s.retail_price,
  s.min_qty,
  s.cost_price,
  s.dia_qty,
  s.metal_type,
  s.category
FROM bj.inventory AS i
JOIN bj.sku       AS s
  ON s.code = i.code
WHERE i.branch_id = 'a758efa5-39c1-4a52-a27b-55b8cc979487'::uuid
 AND i.is_sold = false
ORDER BY i.code, i.size;
